name: FXRPG Friendster Roleplaying Game Strikers
description: XRPG Friendster Roleplaying Game Strikers, is an upcoming visual novel video game which is now dedicated to now-defunct social network called Friendster. This game focuses on the adventures of two protagonists, named Player and Warrior. At the very much beginning of the game, Player gets sent to the world of Burgundy, and meets Warrior for the first time, after that, she gets recruited to the guild that Warrior belong to, called Knights of Believers, led by Assassin, who is the leader of that guild.
